experience: You and David John both know Keith Rezendes, Michael Toll, and 31 others

Capes Media, LLC is a digital projects company responsible for properties such as Mission: Fiction, Crazy Bones, Wesley The Cat, Zion's Daily, Autonaut, and more.The mission of Capes Media is to always be engaged in digital content creating useful, entertaining, and enlightening content.Capes Media does not provide account management, content creation, nor advertising services. See www.godigitalmarketing.com for digital marketing services.

Managed $200K in monthly ad spend across Google, Bing, YouTube, and various retargeting and native ad platforms. My role is to strategize with an internal team of account managers, interface with clients to establish confidence, and provide measurable success and additional opportunities for my clients.

I find digital advertising solutions for small to large businesses of all kinds including service, local, retail, ecommerce, and non-profit. I managed $200,000/mo in ad spend. And lead the development of the Paid Media product at our fast growing digital agency.Our ad strategies include:SearchEcommerceSocialVideoDisplay / BannerRetargeting

At G/O Digital, we assist small to medium size companies by growing their business with online and print advertising. With the power of Gannett, the company behind USA Today, The Arizona Republic and azcentral.com, we will jump start their online advertising campaigns and drive traffic to their website by acquiring top placement on Google, Yahoo and Bing. Additionally, we will increase consumer awareness by positioning our client’s business on Google Maps, and ensuring that they stay top-of-mind through attention-grabbing advertisements in The Arizona Republic, the largest local newspaper in Arizona.

I evaluate a team of digital marketing specialists for quality and deliver trainings for improved quality, product updates, and efficiency improvement.While an ISAM II, I have authored ISAM University, a training and development program for existing specialists. I wrote curriculum, defined criteria for internal certifications, and developed training courses. This certification program is used to rank our workforce on their skills, identify generally applicable training opportunities, and to more relevantly assign workflow.

I served as a full time missionary, working to grow local church congregations across England and Wales. My duties included door-to-door and marketplace contacting, teaching, and training and leading peers.

February 25, 2016, Graham managed David John directly

I have had the privilege of working with DavidJohn over the last year.  DavidJohn joined our agency with some immediate challenges to take from managing budgets, building strategy, growing the team and retaining our clients.  I learned that there is a certain appreciation one must have for how the paid ecosystem works and DavidJohn is nothing short of a creative, calculated, intelligent expert when it comes to Digital Marketing and Paid Media.  He is one the brightest and best I have ever come across in my nearly 10 years of doing digital marketing.  He made a tremendous impact on our deliverables and turned our paid around towards a better, more successful path for our clients and our agency.  Aside from being a data driven excel wizard, I would highly recommend DavidJohn as his leadership and ability to coach & mentor thought leaders within his team is invaluable.  I am proud to have met him, work with him and learn from him!

summary: My passion for digital advertising keeps me up to date on the latest digital trends and tools. Your data is my playground.As a Data Scientist, I leverage data and passion to analyze, strategize, and implement winning digital ad strategies.Digital Specialties: Google AdWords, video advertising, search advertising, display advertising, PPC, SEM, local advertising, ecommerce advertising. Copywriting, graphic design, & website auditing.Leadership:Team and outsourcing management, project management, training, reporting, workflow, streamlining, and product development.
